name: Pica De Gallo Inspired Gazpacho (Gluten-Free)
author: sooperturtle
summary: This is my personal take on gazpacho. It's fresh, healthy, gluten-free, and can be easily vegan. Great summer recipe and great for beginners in the kitchen! DO NOT add water! I like to serve mine in chilled bowls with cooked prawns and fresh cilantro on top.
ingredients: 1  serrano chile pepper, seeded and diced
½ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
1 teaspoon red wine vinegar, or to taste
directions: Blend tomatoes, red onion, and serrano chile pepper in a blender until smooth; add cilantro, lime juice, garlic, vinegar, and salt; blend
Slowly pour olive oil into mixture while the blender is running
